title: Fragment, late 16th–early 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and uncut supplementary warp pile (velvet)
creditline: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
description: Fragment of dark red cut and uncut velvet on a cream-colored ground. Surface divided into small irregular ogive-shaped areas, each enclosing a tiny blossom.
